description: Route data to different paths based on conditional logic evaluation.

input_data.info: Data to be evaluated and routed based on conditions.

conditions.info: JSON array of routing conditions. Each condition should have 'name', 'condition', and optional 'description' fields.

evaluation_mode.info: How to handle multiple matching conditions: first_match (stop at first), all_matches (return all), best_match (return highest scoring).

default_route.info: Name of the route to use when no conditions match (ignored in strict mode).

case_sensitive.info: Whether text comparisons should be case sensitive.

include_metadata.info: Whether to include evaluation metadata in the output.

max_routes.info: Maximum number of routes to return when using 'all_matches' mode (0 for unlimited).

strict_mode.info: In strict mode, throw error if no conditions match instead of using default route.

text_key.info: Key to extract text content from Data objects.

warnings.using_default_route: No conditions matched, using default route: {route}

errors.no_matches_strict_mode: No conditions matched and strict mode is enabled.
